blocks.name: tz6.26
blocks.content: All nonempty (possibly proper) subclasses of ` A ` , which has a well-founded relation ` R ` , have ` R `-minimal elements. Proposition 6.26 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 31. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm tz6.26(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylib(wa(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))), wrex(s0, c2, wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls)), wrex(s0, c2, wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))))
  syl(wa(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wne(c2, emptycls))), wrex(s0, c2, wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))), wreu(s0, c2, wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))))))
  wereu2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  reurex(s0, c2, wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  rexbii(s0, c2, wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls))
  bitr3i(wral(hs0, c2, wn(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), emptycls), wceq(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), emptycls))
  rabeq0(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))
  eqeq1i(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), emptycls, cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)))
  eqtr4i(crab(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))), cpred(c0, c2, cv(s0)), cin(c2, cab(hs0, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))))
  dfrab3(hs0, c2, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0)))
  dfpred2(hs0, c0, c2, cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm tz6.26(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c2, Pred(c0, c2, s0)= ∅))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  sylib(((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅)), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, Pred(c0, c2, s0)= ∅), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c0]s0)))
  syl(((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)∧(c2 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ≠ ∅)), ∃(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c0]s0)), ∃!(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c0]s0)))
  wereu2(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  reurex(s0, c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c0]s0))
  rexbii(s0, c2, ∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c0]s0), Pred(c0, c2, s0)= ∅)
  bitr3i(∀(hs0 ∈ c2, ¬ hs0[c0]s0), Pred(c0, c2, s0)= ∅, { hs0 ∈ c2 | hs0[c0]s0 } = ∅)
  rabeq0(hs0, c2, hs0[c0]s0)
  eqeq1i({ hs0 ∈ c2 | hs0[c0]s0 }, emptycls, Pred(c0, c2, s0))
  eqtr4i({ hs0 ∈ c2 | hs0[c0]s0 }, Pred(c0, c2, s0), (c2 ⋂ { hs0 | hs0[c0]s0 }))
  dfrab3(hs0, c2, hs0[c0]s0)
  dfpred2(hs0, c0, c2, s0)
  vex(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
}

blocks.name: tz6.26i
blocks.content: All nonempty (possibly proper) subclasses of ` A ` , which has a well-founded relation ` R ` , have ` R `-minimal elements. Proposition 6.26 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 31. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Apr-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: wfi
blocks.content: The Principle of Well-Founded Induction. Theorem 6.27 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 32. This principle states that if ` B ` is a subclass of a well-ordered class ` A ` with the property that every element of ` B ` whose inital segment is included in ` A ` is itself equal to ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eqssd(c1, c2, wa(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))))
  adantrl(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wss(c1, c2))
  imp(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wss(c1, c2))
  con4d(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wss(c1, c2))
  syl5bi(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wn(wss(c1, c2)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wne(cdif(c1, c2), emptycls))
  necon3bbii(cdif(c1, c2), emptycls, wss(c1, c2))
  ssdif0(c1, c2)
  mpani(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wne(cdif(c1, c2), emptycls), wn(wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1))
  difss(c1, c2)
  ex(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1), wne(cdif(c1, c2), emptycls)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))))
  sylib(wa(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wa(wss(cdif(c1, c2), c1), wne(cdif(c1, c2), emptycls))), wn(wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wrex(s0, cdif(c1, c2), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls)))
  tz6.26(s0, c0, c1, cdif(c1, c2))
  bitri(wrex(s0, cdif(c1, c2), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls)), wn(wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wrex(s0, c1, wa(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)))))
  rexbii2(s0, cdif(c1, c2), c1, wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls), wa(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  3bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2))), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c2)), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  eldif(cv(s0), c1, c2)
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls)), wa(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  anbi1ci(wn(wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  bitr4i(wceq(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(cdif(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), emptycls, cdif(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  3eqtr4i(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), cdif(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), cdif(c1, c2)), cdif(cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), c2))
  indif2(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1, c2)
  eqtri(cpred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0)), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), cdif(c1, c2)), cin(cdif(c1, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  df-pred(c0, cdif(c1, c2), cv(s0))
  incom(cdif(c1, c2), cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))
  difeq1i(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2, cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1))
  eqtri(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), cin(cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))), c1), cin(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0)))))
  df-pred(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  incom(c1, cima(ccnv(c0), csn(cv(s0))))
  ssdif0(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2)
  rexanali(s0, c1, wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  simprl(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wss(c2, c1), wral(s0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: wfii
blocks.content: The Principle of Well-Founded Induction. Theorem 6.27 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 32. This principle states that if ` B ` is a subclass of a well-ordered class ` A ` with the property that every element of ` B ` whose inital segment is included in ` A ` is itself equal to ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: wfisg
blocks.content: Well-Founded Induction Schema. If a property passes from all elements less than ` y ` of a well-founded class ` A ` to ` y ` itself (induction hypothesis), then the property holds for all elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfisg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0), wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, w0)))
  mpanr12(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wceq(c1, crab(s0, c1, w0)), wss(crab(s0, c1, w0), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, w0)))))
  ssrab2(s0, c1, w0)
  rgen(hs0, c1, wi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, w0))))
  syl6ibr(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wcel(cv(hs0), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  anc2li(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  syl5(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)))
  sylbi(wss(cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c1, w0))))
  dfss3(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), crab(s0, c1, w0))
  ralimi(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s1), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  elrabsf(s0, cv(s1), c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfim(s0, wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  nfral(s0, s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  nfcv(s0, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)))
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(s1), w0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0, wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  raleqdv(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), cpred(c0, c1, cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  predeq3(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  elrabsf(s0, cv(hs0), c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  wfi(hs0, c0, c1, crab(s0, c1, w0))
  rabid2(s0, c1, w0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, c0, c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crab(s0, c1, w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wfisg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylib((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0), c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  mpanr12((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1), c1 = { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } ⊆ c1, ∀(hs0 ∈ c1,(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })))
  ssrab2(s0, c1, w0)
  rgen(hs0, c1, (Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 } → hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))
  syl6ibr(hs0 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, hs0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧[hs0 / s0]w0))
  anc2li(hs0 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  syl5(hs0 ∈ c1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [hs0 / s0]w0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0))
  sylbi(Pred(c0, c1, hs0)⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }))
  dfss3(s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  ralimi(s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0)
  simprbi(s1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 }, [s1 / s0]w0, s1 ∈ c1)
  elrabsf(s0, s1, c1, w0)
  chvar(s0, hs0, (hs0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0)), (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0)))
  nfim(s0, hs0 ∈ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  nfim(s0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfral(s0, s1, Pred(c0, c1, hs0), [s1 / s0]w0)
  nfcv(s0, Pred(c0, c1, hs0))
  nfsbc1v(s0, s1, w0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ∈ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0), hs0 ∈ c1, (∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0)→[hs0 / s0]w0))
  eleq1w(s0, hs0, c1)
  imbi12d(s0 = hs0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0), w0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, hs0),[s1 / s0]w0), [hs0 / s0]w0)
  raleqdv(s1, Pred(c0, c1, s0), Pred(c0, c1, hs0), s0 = hs0, [s1 / s0]w0)
  predeq3(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  sbceq1a(s0, hs0, w0)
  elrabsf(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  wfi(hs0, c0, c1, { s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
  rabid2(s0, c1, w0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, c1, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cpred.s(s0, c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cpred.s(s1, c0, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ∈ c1 | w0 })
}

blocks.name: wfis
blocks.content: Well-Founded Induction Schema. If all elements less than a given set ` x ` of the well-founded class ` A ` have a property (induction hypothesis), then all elements of ` A ` have that property. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfis(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  -| wwe(c1, c0)
  -| wse(c1, c0)
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspec(s0, c0, w0)
  mp2an(wral(s0, c0, w0), wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0))
  wfisg(s0, s1, c1, c0, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wfis(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 → w0)
  ⊣ c1 ≤ c0
  ⊣ c1[Se]c0
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c1, c0, s0),[s1 / s0]w0)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspec(s0, c0, w0)
  mp2an(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w0), c1 ≤ c0, c1[Se]c0)
  wfisg(s0, s1, c1, c0, w0)
}

blocks.name: wfis2fg
blocks.content: Well-Founded Induction Schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfis2fg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w1), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  wfisg(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  syl5bi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0)), w0, wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w1))
  ralbii(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), w1)
  bitr3i(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wfis2fg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0), w1)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  wfisg(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0)
  syl5bi(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0),[s1 / s0]w0), w0, ∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0), w1))
  ralbii(s1, Pred(c0, c1, s0), [s1 / s0]w0, w1)
  bitr3i([s1 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: wfis2f
blocks.content: Well Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)

thm wfis2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  -| wwe(c1, c0)
  -| wse(c1, c0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), w1), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspec(s0, c0, w0)
  mp2an(wral(s0, c0, w0), wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0))
  wfis2fg(s0, s1, c1, c0, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wfis2f(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 → w0)
  ⊣ c1 ≤ c0
  ⊣ c1[Se]c0
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c1, c0, s0), w1)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {

  mp2an(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w0), c1 ≤ c0, c1[Se]c0)

}

blocks.name: wfis2g
blocks.content: Well-Founded Induction Schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfis2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(wwe(c0, c1), wse(c0, c1)), wral(s0, c1, w0))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c0, c1, cv(s0)), w1), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  wfis2fg(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  nfv(s0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wfis2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ≤ c1 ∧ c0[Se]c1)→ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, w0))
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c0, c1, s0), w1)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  wfis2fg(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  nfv(s0, w1)
}

blocks.name: wfis2
blocks.content: Well Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfis2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  -| wwe(c1, c0)
  -| wse(c1, c0)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c1, c0, cv(s0)), w1), w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

  mp2an(wral(s0, c0, w0), wwe(c1, c0), wse(c1, c0))
  wfis2g(s0, s1, c1, c0, w0, w1)

blocks.pretty:
thm wfis2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0 → w0)
  ⊣ c1 ≤ c0
  ⊣ c1[Se]c0
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c0 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c1, c0, s0), w1)→ w0))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  rspec(s0, c0, w0)
  mp2an(∀(s0 ∈ c0, w0), c1 ≤ c0, c1[Se]c0)

}

blocks.name: wfis3
blocks.content: Well Founded Induction schema, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm wfis3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
  -| wwe(c2, c1)
  -| wse(c2, c1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wi(wral(s1, cpred(c2, c1, cv(s0)), w2), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  vtoclga(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  wfis2(s0, s1, c1, c2, w1, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm wfis3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → w0)
  ⊣ c2 ≤ c1
  ⊣ c2[Se]c1
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ (s0 ∈ c1 →(∀(s1 ∈ Pred(c2, c1, s0), w2)→ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  vtoclga(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  wfis2(s0, s1, c1, c2, w1, w2)
}
